info.title: Card Fraud Transaction Management API
info.description: API for ingesting fraud decision events and querying transaction data. Uses PostgreSQL with the fraud_gov schema (shared with card-fraud-rule-management).

get.description: Check if the service is running.
Check if the service is ready to receive traffic.

schema.title: Response Liveness Check Health Live Get

post.description: Ingest a fraud decision event (HTTP endpoint for dev/testing).

get.description: Get a paginated list of transactions with optional filtering.

parameters.name: assigned_to_me

schema.description: Filter transactions assigned to current user
schema.title: Assigned To Me

parameters.description: Filter transactions assigned to current user

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific transaction.
Get AUTH and MONITORING events (and matches) for a transaction_id.
Get combined view with transaction, review, notes, case, and optional matched rules.

schema.title: Response Get Metrics Api V1 Metrics Get

get.description: Get or create review for a transaction.

post.description: Create a new review for a transaction (if not exists).

patch.description:
Update transaction review status.

Valid status transitions:
- PENDING → IN_REVIEW, ESCALATED, RESOLVED, CLOSED
- IN_REVIEW → PENDING, ESCALATED, RESOLVED, CLOSED
- ESCALATED → IN_REVIEW, RESOLVED, CLOSED
- RESOLVED → CLOSED
- CLOSED → (none)
Assign a transaction review to an analyst.

post.description: Escalate a transaction review to a supervisor.

get.description:
List notes for a transaction.

Private notes are only returned to their author or supervisors.

post.description: Create a new note on a transaction.

patch.description:
Update a note.

Only the note author can update their own notes.
System-generated notes cannot be edited.

delete.description:
Delete a note.

Only the note author or a supervisor can delete notes.
System-generated notes cannot be deleted.

get.description:
List cases with optional filters.

- Use `assigned_to_me=true` to only show cases assigned to current analyst

post.description:
Create a new case from transactions.

Transactions are linked to the case via their review records.

patch.description:
Update a case.

To resolve/close a case, include resolution_summary.

get.description: Get a case by its case number.
Get all transactions associated with a case.

schema.title: Response Get Case Transactions Api V1 Cases  Case Id  Transactions Get

post.description: Add a transaction to a case.

delete.description: Remove a transaction from a case.

get.description: Get activity log for a case.

schema.title: Response Get Case Activity Api V1 Cases  Case Id  Activity Get

parameters.name: resolution_summary

schema.description: Summary of how the case was resolved
schema.title: Resolution Summary

parameters.description: Summary of how the case was resolved

get.description:
Get worklist for the current analyst.

- Use `assigned_only=true` to get only items assigned to you
- Use `status` to filter by review status (PENDING, IN_REVIEW, ESCALATED, etc.)
- Use `priority_filter` to only show high-priority items (1=highest, 5=lowest)
- Use `risk_level_filter` to only show items at a specific risk level

parameters.name: priority_filter

schema.description: Only show items at or below this priority (1=highest)
schema.title: Priority Filter

parameters.description: Only show items at or below this priority (1=highest)

parameters.name: risk_level_filter

schema.description: Only show items at this risk level (LOW|MEDIUM|HIGH|CRITICAL)
schema.title: Risk Level Filter

parameters.description: Only show items at this risk level (LOW|MEDIUM|HIGH|CRITICAL)

get.description:
Get worklist statistics.

Returns unassigned counts and current analyst's assigned counts.

Get unassigned transactions available for claim.

- Use `priority_filter` to only show high-priority items (1=highest, 5=lowest)
- Use `risk_level_filter` to only show items at or above this risk level

parameters.name: priority_filter

schema.description: Only show items at or below this priority (1=highest)
schema.title: Priority Filter

parameters.description: Only show items at or below this priority (1=highest)

post.description:
Claim the next unassigned transaction.

Automatically assigns the highest-priority unassigned transaction
(matching any filters) to the current analyst.

Returns the claimed worklist item, or 404 if no items are available.

Bulk assign transactions to an analyst.

Maximum 100 transactions per request.

Bulk update transaction review status.

Maximum 100 transactions per request.

Bulk create a case from transactions.

Creates a new case and adds all specified transactions to it.
Maximum 100 transactions per request.

Returns the created case ID and case number.

analyst_id.title: Analyst Id
analyst_id.description: ID of the analyst to assign to

AssignRequest.title: AssignRequest
AssignRequest.description: Schema for assigning a transaction review to an analyst.

transaction_ids.title: Transaction Ids
transaction_ids.description: List of transaction IDs to assign (max 100 per request)

analyst_id.title: Analyst Id
analyst_id.description: Analyst ID to assign all transactions to

BulkAssignRequest.title: BulkAssignRequest
BulkAssignRequest.description: Schema for bulk assigning transactions to an analyst.

transaction_ids.title: Transaction Ids
transaction_ids.description: List of transaction IDs to include in case (max 100 per request)

case_type.title: Case Type
case_type.description: Type of case (INVESTIGATION, DISPUTE, CHARGEBACK, etc.)

BulkCreateCaseRequest.title: BulkCreateCaseRequest
BulkCreateCaseRequest.description: Schema for bulk creating a case from transactions.

created_case_number.title: Created Case Number
created_case_number.description: Case number of created case (if applicable)

error_summary.title: Error Summary
error_summary.description: Summary of errors by error code

BulkOperationResult.title: BulkOperationResult
BulkOperationResult.description: Result of a single bulk operation item.

transaction_ids.title: Transaction Ids
transaction_ids.description: List of transaction IDs to update (max 100 per request)

BulkStatusRequest.title: BulkStatusRequest
BulkStatusRequest.description: Schema for bulk updating transaction status.

CaseActivityResponse.title: CaseActivityResponse
CaseActivityResponse.description: Response schema for case activity log entry.

transaction_ids.title: Transaction Ids
transaction_ids.description: Transaction IDs to add to the case

assigned_analyst_id.title: Assigned Analyst Id
assigned_analyst_id.description: Analyst to assign the case to

CaseTransactionLink.title: CaseTransactionLink
CaseTransactionLink.description: Schema for linking a transaction to a case.

CaseType.title: CaseType
CaseType.description: Type of case for grouping related transactions.

priority_filter.title: Priority Filter
priority_filter.description: Only claim transactions at or below this priority (lower = higher priority)

risk_level_filter.description: Only claim transactions at this risk level or higher

ClaimRequest.title: ClaimRequest
ClaimRequest.description: Schema for claiming the next unassigned transaction.

CombinedTransactionView.title: CombinedTransactionView
CombinedTransactionView.description: Combined AUTH + MONITORING view for a transaction_id.

transaction_context.title: Transaction Context
transaction_context.description: Full payload from rule engine with all evaluation context

velocity_snapshot.title: Velocity Snapshot
velocity_snapshot.description: All velocity states at decision time

velocity_results.title: Velocity Results
velocity_results.description: Per-rule velocity calculation results for matched rules

engine_metadata.title: Engine Metadata
engine_metadata.description: Engine mode, processing time, errors, and runtime metadata

DecisionEventCreate.title: DecisionEventCreate
DecisionEventCreate.description: Decision event for ingestion (HTTP POST body).

DecisionType.title: DecisionType
DecisionType.description: Transaction decision type (engine decision outcome only).

escalate_to.title: Escalate To
escalate_to.description: ID of the analyst/supervisor to escalate to

EscalateRequest.title: EscalateRequest
EscalateRequest.description: Schema for escalating a transaction review.

IngestionSource.title: IngestionSource
IngestionSource.description: How the decision event was ingested.

is_private.title: Is Private
is_private.description: Whether note is private (only visible to author and supervisors)

NoteCreate.title: NoteCreate
NoteCreate.description: Schema for creating an analyst note.

NoteType.title: NoteType
NoteType.description: Type of analyst note for classification.

NoteUpdate.title: NoteUpdate
NoteUpdate.description: Schema for updating an analyst note.

ResolveRequest.title: ResolveRequest
ResolveRequest.description: Schema for resolving a transaction review.

RuleAction.title: RuleAction
RuleAction.description: Action determined by a matched rule.

RuleMatch.title: RuleMatch
RuleMatch.description: A rule that matched during fraud evaluation.

status.description: New status (must follow valid state transitions)

resolution_notes.title: Resolution Notes
resolution_notes.description: Required when status is RESOLVED or CLOSED

StatusUpdateRequest.title: StatusUpdateRequest
StatusUpdateRequest.description: Schema for updating transaction review status.

TransactionDetails.title: TransactionDetails
TransactionDetails.description: Transaction details from the decision event.

next_cursor.title: Next Cursor
next_cursor.description: Cursor for next page (null if no more pages)

TransactionListResponse.title: TransactionListResponse
TransactionListResponse.description: Paginated transaction list with keyset pagination.

case.title: Case
case.description: Case details if transaction is linked to a case

TransactionOverview.title: TransactionOverview
TransactionOverview.description:
Combined transaction overview for analyst UI (single call).

Includes transaction, review, notes, case, and optional matched_rules.

TransactionQueryResult.title: TransactionQueryResult
TransactionQueryResult.description: Transaction query result - matches fraud_gov.transactions table.

WorklistItem.title: WorklistItem
WorklistItem.description: A single item in the analyst worklist.
